original_text: This is what the Lord said to me, Zechariah. ‘My people are like sheep. There will be a time when men will buy them. And then they will kill them. But feed them until that time.
korean_text: 여호와 나의 하나님이 이르시되 너는 잡혀 죽을 양 떼를 먹이라

sentences.original_text: This is what the Lord said to me
There will be a time when men will buy them
sentences.korean_translation: 사람들이 그들을 살 때가 올 것이다

sentences.original_text: And then they will kill them
But feed them until that time
